metadata.description: Triathlon coaching skill powered by intervals.icu data

plugins.name: triathlon-training
plugins.description: Triathlon coaching skill that analyses intervals.icu training data per discipline (swim/bike/run). Provides CTL/ATL/TSB trends, aerobic decoupling assessment, overtraining signals, race readiness, and session breakdowns. Requires the intervals.icu MCP server configured with your API key and athlete ID.
